General.Name: Shandong Bailong Chuangyuan Bio-Tech Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shandong Bailong Chuangyuan Bio-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of functional sugar in China and internationally. The company offers dietary fibers, including polydextrose and resistant dextrin; prebiotics, such as fructo-oligosaccharide, isomalto- oligosaccharide, galacto- oligosaccharide, and xylo- oligosaccharide. It also provides starch sugars comprising allulose, maltitol, organic maltodextrin, allulose psicose, and isomaltulose, as well as allulose power and maltitol syrups. The company's products are used in food, medicine, health products, feed, and other industries. It servs in the markets, including Africa, Americas, Asia, the Caribbean, Europe, the Middle East, Oceania, and internationally. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yucheng, China.
